reviews.review_msg: Lectures were a little boring, but not hard. If u r engaged and participate it will be noticed and appreciated. Prof does not require performance beyond the norm, if u listen carefully to his requirements, then you will pass the course. I was hard-worker whole semester but my final presentation performance wasn't that good, but still got fine grade
Hes a really great instructor. Everyone in the class enjoyed his lectures. He also has a good sense of humour

He is an amazing instructor, I was really afraid to take my INTG class with him when I saw his rate but now I would like to take this prof again for every English. he is not an easy marker but if you listen carefully to what he wants from you and participate in class lectures you will be all good.

Hi everybody, if you want to skip ALC, you MUST/BETTER NOT choose David's INTG class. And David always give student worst marks!! DO NOT CHOOSE HIS CLASS EVER, WORST TEACHER!!! I want to give David 0 point if I can, but this rate my professor system starts from 1 point.

So terrible teacher , who can't give you anything, loves to have questions answered, likes to drag out classes, likes to drink tea, doesn't give high marks, and is welcome to take his class because no one will rob you.
Too much work and too picky.
